resource.comment: Come for review. Overall doing better. Mood still low but improving. More good days than bad. Energy levels ok. Motivation improving. Support from neighbour - visits daily.
MSE euthymic. Not anxious. No DSH / hallucinations / abnormal thoughts. Never smoked tobacco.
Walking practice (XaBfy)Advised re local walking group
Very positive after holiday, much improved. Level of anxiety (Xa3Xk)low and Has shown no side effects from medication (XaJHr)
